Yabbit is your crm integration solution. The Yabbit extension connects your existing Yabbit account to your favorite CRM platforms like Salesforce, Zoho, Redtail and more. 

The Yabbit extension includes
- Click to call
- Screen pop 
- Call history
- Dialer 
- and more

Simple click add to chrome and sign in.
